thread.title: Nach Baliye 8: Mona Lisa and Vikrant confirm participation, begin rehearsals already. Watch video

author: Priyanka Sharma
title: Nach Baliye 8: Mona Lisa and Vikrant confirm participation, begin rehearsals already. Watch video
text:
Nach Baliye 8: Mona Lisa and Vikrant confirm participation, begin rehearsals already. Watch video Nach Baliye 8: Mona Lisa and Vikrant confirm participation, begin rehearsals already. Watch video Nach Baliya 8: Mona Lisa and Vikrant Singh Rajput are one of the celebrity couples on the upcoming season of the dance reality show. Written by Priyanka Sharma | Mumbai | Updated: February 21, 2017 9:36 pm Mona Lisa and husband Vikrant have begun prepping for the upcoming season of Nach Baliye. 
One of the first couples to be confirmed for the eighth season of Nach Baliye 8, Mona Lisa and husband Vikrant Singh Rajput have already started prepping for the show. Mona shared a video on her Twitter page from the first day of their rehearsals and it seems the newlyweds want to leave no stone unturned to impress the audience and the judges on the debut episode of the season. More from the world of Entertainment: 

The former Bigg Boss 10 contestant captioned the short video, writing, ‚ÄúDay 1 of rehearsal‚Ä¶with mistakes and imperfection‚Ä¶but we will make it‚Ä¶ It‚Äôs difficult but enjoying like anything‚Ä¶ #NachBaliye8.‚Äù The couple is seen rehearsing to the romantic track ‚ÄúEnna Sona‚Äù from the Aditya Kapur- Shraddha Kapoor -starrer Ok Jaanu. 
Here‚Äôs Mona‚Äôs tweet: Day 1 of rehearsal‚Ä¶with mistakes and imperfection‚Ä¶but we will make itüôèüôè‚Ä¶ It‚Äôs difficult but enjoying like anything‚Ä¶ #NachBaliye8 pic.twitter.com/om6LsYXa4O 
‚Äî Monalisa (@MonalisaAntara) February 20, 2017 
Nach Baliye 8 will begin airing next month and like every year, even this season is high on speculation around the participating celebrity couples in the dance show and its panel of judges. Gossip mills are abuzz that probable contestants include Divyanka Tripathi -Vivek Dahiya Rohan Mehra-Kanchi Singh, Kishwer Merchant-Suyyash Rai, Bharti Singh-Harsh Sharma, Sambhavana Seth-Avinash Dwivedi, Rahul Dev-Mugdha Godse and Ashmit Patel-Mahek Chahal. 
Also read | After Bigg Boss 10, Mona Lisa is doing a film with husband Vikrant. See pics 
There have also been reports that Bollywood star Sonakshi Sinha will be one of the judges and actor Karan Singh Grover will host the series, which will be aired on Star Plus. The new season will be backed by BBC Production and not Ekta Kapoor , who produced the previous edition and introduced a new format along the lines of Bigg Boss. ¬© The Indian Express Online Media Pvt Ltd
